text.section:
Money is prima facie contraband if a law enforcement officer in the State seizes the money in connection with an arrest for:
unlawfully playing or operating a bookmaking scheme;
unlawfully betting on a horse race, athletic event, lottery, or game; or
using an unlawful gaming table or gaming device.

section.section: For purposes of this subsection, the Police Department of Baltimore City is not a State authority.

All rights in, title to, and interest in money seized under subsection (a) of this section shall immediately vest in and to:
the county or the municipal corporation, if the money is seized by the police of the local government, including a sheriff's department that is the local law enforcement unit; or
the State, if the money is seized by a State authority.
